title: Gulfstream
creator_credit: Bruce Mackay, ONF | NFB and William Hansen
brief_description: A beautifully photographed film that records a sailing expedition through the Gulf Stream in the North Atlantic sea. The changing weather patterns are discussed and the many species of animals, that inhabit the waters, are examined.
creator_credit_for_label: Bruce Mackay, ONF | NFB and William Hansen
